mapper.select: select p_chat_no as pChatNo, project_no as projectNo, p_chat_sender as pChatSender, p_chat_content as pChatContent, p_chat_time as pChatTime, p_chat_img as pChatImg from project_chat where project_no=#{_parameter}

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memerStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate from member where member_no in #{no}

select p_file_no as pFileNo, project_no as projectNo, p_file_writer as pFileWriter, p_filename as pFilename, p_filepath as pFilepath, p_file_time as pFileTime from project_file where project_no =#{_parameter}

select p_schedule_no as pScheduleNo, project_no as projectNo, p_schedule_writer as pScheduleWriter, p_schedule_content as pScheduleContent, p_schedule_start as pScheduleStart, p_schedule_end as pScheduleEnd from project_schedule where project_no = #{_parameter}
